head.supplied: ¶ [A letter was received from Baron von Mueller thanking the Society for the honour they had conferred on him by electing him an Honorary Member of the Society. ¶ He also forwarded a collection of S...

div.p: MS 12521 Victorian Horticultural Society, box 3401, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

Letter not found. Kirkland was honorary secretary of the Victorian Horticultural Improvement Society. This letter was minuted at the committee meeting held on 2 March 1882.
[A letter was received from Baron von Mueller thanking the Society for the honour they had conferred on him by electing him an Honorary Member of the Society.
See n. 3 to M to J. Kirkland, October 1881 (in this edition as 81-10-00a). He also forwarded a collection of Seeds and a work entitled "Census of Genera of Plants Hitherto Known as Indigenous to Australia" (Mueller).
B82.01.06. ]
